channel.title: [317] PI - Error running server (compiling works)
channel.description:
Can someone explain what exactly whats this means would be much appreciative!!!
http://gyazo.com/7de88a0ad992a611038819846c54f0a3

item.title: [317] PI - Error running server (compiling works)
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

Signals that an unexpected exception has occurred in a static initializer. An ExceptionInInitializerError is thrown to indicate that an exception occurred during evaluation of a static initializer or the initializer for a static variable.

In ItemHandler look for the static initialiser block (shown below) and fix it (maybe add a try-catch block around it?).

static { // stuff here ... }

Read full topic
